classic.name: Colosseum
classic.description: Monumental 3-tiered Roman amphitheater once used for gladiatorial games, with guided tour option.
classic.address: Piazza del Colosseo, 1, 00184 Roma RM, Italy

classic.name: Pantheon
classic.description: Iconic temple built circa 118 to 125 A.D. with a dome & Renaissance tombs, including Raphael's.
classic.address: Piazza della Rotonda, 00186 Roma RM, Italy

classic.name: Saint Peter’s Basilica
classic.description: Late Renaissance church by architects including Michelangelo & holding up to 20,000 worshippers.
classic.address: Piazza San Pietro, 00120 Città del Vaticano, Vatican City

classic.name: Papal Basilica of Saint Mary Major
classic.description: Landmark papal basilica founded in the 5th century & known for its Roman mosaics & gilded ceiling.
classic.address: P.za di Santa Maria Maggiore, 00100 Roma RM, Italy

classic.name: Roman Forum
classic.description: Vast excavated area of Roman temples, squares & government buildings, some dating back 2,000 years.
classic.address: 00186 Rome, Metropolitan City of Rome Capital, Italy

classic.name: Monument to Victor Emmanuel II
classic.description: Grand marble neoclassical temple honoring Italy's first king & First World War soldiers.

classic.name: Trevi Fountain
classic.description: Aqueduct-fed rococo fountain, designed by Nicola Salvi & completed in 1762, with sculpted figures.
classic.address: Piazza di Trevi, 00187 Roma RM, Italy

classic.name: Castel Sant'Angelo
classic.description: Circular, 2nd-century castle housing furniture & paintings collections in Renaissance apartments.

classic.name: Piazza Navona
classic.description: Elegant square dating from the 1st century A.D., with a baroque fountain, street artists & bars.

classic.name: Sistine Chapel
classic.description: Famous chapel in the Vatican Museums, best known for Michelangelo's 16th-century painted ceiling.

foodie.name: La Nuova Piazzetta
foodie.description: Pasta, pizza & other classic dishes pair with wine in this basic, brick-lined eatery with a terrace.
foodie.address: Vicolo del Buon Consiglio, 23/a, 00184 Roma RM, Italy

foodie.name: Tonnarello | Paglia
foodie.description: Casual stop for pasta, meatballs & other simple Roman dishes, plus patio seating & acoustic guitar.
foodie.address: V. della Paglia, 1/2/3, 00153 Roma RM, Italy

foodie.name: Nannarella
foodie.description: Modest eatery offering Italian staples such as pasta, pizza & seafood, plus wine & sidewalk seating.
foodie.address: Piazza di S. Calisto, 7/a, 00153 Roma RM, Italy

foodie.name: Two Sizes
foodie.description: Cozy nook famed for its 5 flavors of tiramisu, in large or small portions, plus Sicilian cannoli.
foodie.address: V. del Governo Vecchio, 88, 00186 Roma RM, Italy

foodie.name: Mimì e Cocò
foodie.description: Antipasti, pasta & pizza, plus regional wines, at a charming, quirkily decorated bar/trattoria.
foodie.address: V. del Governo Vecchio, 72, 00186 Roma RM, Italy

foodie.name: Osteria da Fortunata - Rinascimento

foodie.name: Barnum Roma
foodie.address: Via del Pellegrino, 87, 00186 Roma RM, Italy

foodie.name: Regoli Pasticceria
foodie.description: Century-old, family-owned shop with arched ceilings, selling classic creme-based pastries & tarts.
foodie.address: Via dello Statuto, 60, 00185 Roma RM, Italy

foodie.name: Antico Forno Roscioli
foodie.description: Renowned bakery & deli founded in 1972, popular for its crispy, thin-crust Roman-style pizzas.
foodie.address: Via dei Chiavari, 34, 00186 Roma RM, Italy

adventure.name: Fontana dell'Acqua Paola
adventure.description: Ornate marble fountain commissioned by Pope Paul V, floodlit at night, with impressive city views.

adventure.name: Giardino degli Aranci
adventure.description: Secluded public square with fragrant orange trees, medieval walls & views over the city & Tiber.
adventure.address: Piazza Pietro D'Illiria, 00153 Roma RM, Italy

adventure.name: Passeggiata del Pincio
adventure.description: Historic promenade featuring 200+ busts of prominent figures, gardens & picturesque city views.
adventure.address: Viale Gabriele D'Annunzio, 00197 Roma RM, Italy

adventure.name: Temple of Aesculapius
adventure.description: Picturesque 1786 Ionic style temple amid a scenic lake & accessible by a wooden pier.
adventure.address: Via Ulisse Aldrovandi, 6, 00197 Roma RM, Italy

adventure.name: The Park of the Aqueducts
adventure.description: Protected parkland with a Roman aqueduct & ancient archaeological sites, plus a former mill.

adventure.name: Villa Borghese
adventure.description: Vast urban park with formally landscaped gardens, a lake & villas now housing important museums.
adventure.address: 00197 Rome, Metropolitan City of Rome Capital, Italy

adventure.name: Villa Doria Pamphili
adventure.description: Landscaped park on ancient noble Roman estate, with open-air concerts, nature trails & fountain.
adventure.address: Via di San Pancrazio, 00152 Roma RM, Italy

adventure.name: Bioparco di Roma
adventure.description: Zoo with elephants & Komodo dragons, animal feeding sessions, a theater & summer camp for children.
adventure.address: Piazzale del, V.le del Giardino Zoologico, 1, 00197 Roma RM, Italy

adventure.name: Hydromania
adventure.description: Large family-friendly attraction with leisure & fitness pools, wave machines & extreme water rides.

adventure.name: Vittorio Emanuele II Square
adventure.description: Bustling public square with statues, monuments & the archaeological remains of a fountain.
